mapper.select: SELECT D.DOM_CD, D.BLD_CD, D.STU_CD, D.COMD_CD, D.DOM_YEAR, D.PAY_YN, D.DOM_SEM, A.APP_REG, D.ROOM_CD, (SELECT U.USER_NM FROM USERS U WHERE U.USER_CD = D.STU_CD) USER_NM, (SELECT C.COMD_NM FROM COMMON_DETAIL C WHERE D.BLD_CD = C.COMD_CD) COMD_NM, (SELECT A.APP_YN FROM APPROVAL A WHERE D.APP_CD = A.APP_CD) APP_YN FROM DORMITORY D, USERS U, APPROVAL A, BUILDING B WHERE D.STU_CD = U.USER_CD AND D.APP_CD = A.APP_CD AND D.BLD_CD = B.BLD_CD AND D.STU_CD = #{stuCd} ORDER BY A.APP_REG DESC

U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_PASS, U.USER_BANK, U.USER_DEPO, U.USER_ACC,
A.USER_CD, A.COMD_CD, A.APP_TARGET, A.APP_YN, A.APP_REG, A.APP_PRODT, A.APP_RET, APP_PCD,
B.COL_CD, B.BLD_ZIP, B.BLD_ADDR1, B.BLD_ADDR2,
S.DEP_CD, S.STU_YEAR, S.STU_SEM, S.STU_MRC, S.STU_MOC, S.STU_CRC, S.STU_COC, S.STU_ADDT, S.STU_GRDT
FROM DORMITORY D, USERS U, APPROVAL A, BUILDING B, STUDENT S
WHERE B.BLD_CD = D.BLD_CD AND S.STU_CD = D.STU_CD AND D.STU_CD = U.USER_CD AND A.APP_CD = D.APP_CD AND D.DOM_CD = #{domCd}
